ti:edition.ti:label: περὶ τοῦ Στεφάνου τῆς τριηραρκίας
ti:edition.ti:description: Demosthenis. Orationes. Vol. III. Rennie, W., editor. Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1931.

ti:translation.ti:label: On the Trierarchic Crown, by an Unknown Pleader
